description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.FlmHQuHt3IS4H9vQ]{The Gap Anchor}

You gain the ability to subtly smudge the timelines of others, removing yourself from their recent memory. Once per day as a move action, you can designate a creature within 60 feet to lose all memory of your prior actions and presence over the last hour. This otherwise works as the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.DcELEg3BAXH3NtsI]{Modify Memory} spell, except it adjusts all of the targetâ€™s memories that include you. In memories where you were present, the target can remember only an indistinct blur in your place. The target can attempt a Will save to negate this effect. A target can be affected by this ability only once per week.
